description: Transport Canada has requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of 210 tablet chairs (105 Right side and 105 left side) to Ottawa, ON before March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
**Tablet Chairs Tender Announcement**
====================================================

**Title:** Purchase, Delivery, and Installation of Tablet Chairs for Transport Canada
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01016106
**Publication Date:** December 6, 2022

**Tender Details:**
-----------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada
* **Location:** Ottawa, ON, Canada (National Capital Region)
* **Expected Contract Duration:** March 31, 2023

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Description:**
Transport Canada is soliciting proposals for the purchase, delivery, and installation of tablet chairs for its Ottawa, ON location. A total of 210 tablet chairs (105 right-handed and 105 left-handed) are required.

**Deliverables:**
----------------

* Supply and deliver 210 tablet chairs to Transport Canada's Ottawa location
* Install the tablet chairs in accordance with Transport Canada's requirements

**Amendments:**
--------------

* **Amendment 1:** Corrected the bid closing date to December 16, 2022, at 2:00 pm EST
* **Amendment 2:** Answers to questions from potential bidders can be found in the attached document (Q & A #1)

**Trade Agreements:**
-------------------

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contracting Information:**
-------------------------

* **Contact:** Fanie Charron, fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca
* **Attachments:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/366e421e9f809824208abecc70a25725/t8080-220419_-_q_as_1.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/06
